bwwExcerpt: "Still, the cast of "Burn the Floor" seems to be having a good time, even to the point of carrying the action into the aisles of the Longacre. But then ballroom dancing may be more fun to perform than to watch. Lessons anyone?" Lisa

keyPhrases.quote: But then ballroom dancing may be more fun to perform than to watch.
